text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer camp, a time for Tracen<n>Academy students to train
at the<n>beach and push their abilities to new<n>heights.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Well... That's what it's supposed to<n>be.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woooow! Feel this energy? The<n>adventure's about to start!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We should be at the campground on<n>the beach, but
somehow we've<n>ended up in this forest.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In a desperate attempt to clear my<n>confusion, I try to recall
how we got<n>here...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The waves! The wind! The<n>thunderous squalls! I can hear
the sea<n>calling!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But it must wait! Another place calls!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The forest! In the deepest woods is<n>where beetles wage
war for sap. Only<n>there can I draw out my latent power!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Raise anchors, Trainer! We're outta<n>here!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Boarding pass—check. Cards, chess,<n>checkers, and go
board for the plane<n>ride—check

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: There, that's everything! Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Woohooo! Green as far as the eye<n>can see! Now begins our
true camp of<n>summer!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: To the forest we go! It's time to catch<n>bugs!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We should be at the summer camp by<n>now, but for some
reason, the two of<n>us are wandering around a forest...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh, a rainbow-colored mushroom!<n>Hey, those things are
edible, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Aw heck, what's a little poison, huh?<n>Shouldn't be anything
more than a<n>minor emergency!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Right, nothing major...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm Gold Ship's trainer. It's about<n>time I check that wild
spirit of hers!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What's up with you? You're all quiet.<n>Come on, we're
about to go bug<n>collecting.
choice_data_list:
I've got a better idea. Let's explore some
ancient ruins!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huuuuuh?! You feeling okay? 'Causethat sounds amazing!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hm? Beep-beep! Beep, beep!Golshi Radar signal detected! Theruins are thataway!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
To me, my trainer! There are vast<n>riches waiting to be
discovered!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're off and running through the<n>trees on Gold Ship's big
summer<n>adventure!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hmm, a fork in the road. Do we go<n>right? Or left...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wait... I'm the mighty Gold Ship—I<n>reject these options and
substitute<n>my own!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: We go through, Trainer! Wedon't follow in someone's footsteps,we carve new paths for our own!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wait, whoooa! Why's there a cliff?! I<n>can't stooop!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Suddenly we're running down a<n>steep slope through the
thick brush!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! Heck yeah, this is the best!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... I know I'mamazing, but that was so muchrunning. Even I'm tired.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But you kept up the whole way. Not<n>bad, Trainer.
choice_data_list: You deserve the best, after all.
You deserve the best, after all.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh? Nicely said, my fine fellow! You'll<n>be top-class yet!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Then I've got a little gift for ya...<n>Check it out. The sun's
setting over<n>the sea.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All this scenery, the adventure, and<n>everything! This is what
I've always<n>wanted to show you!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Aw, I just made that up. Doesn't<n>change how good this
view is though.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The whole ocean is sparkling in the<n>sunset. It looks just like
a crowd of<n>fans waving light sticks at a winning<n>concert.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I'm really pumped to see all sorts of<n>other stuff with you
too.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
So let's aim for the big one<n>together—being the world's
greatest<n>treasure hunters!
choice_data_list: I'm with you to the end!
I'm with you to the end!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right! Towards the sun we go! Only<n>a true Umamusume
gets the urge to<n>run into the sunset!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: URAAAAGH! With me, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As usual, I have no idea what she's<n>actually talking about,
but I feel that<n>the adventure has really narrowed<n>the
distance between us.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: How the heck should I know?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although we're unsure of where to<n>go, we make it out of
the wilderness<n>and back to Tracen Academy...<n>together.
